description: it's a bug if you see this
Popular Linux distributive, known to be merciful towards new users.

Proprietary APEX operating system serving a thin interface for the underlying designer AI engine. Though command-line in outward nature, it requires at least some measure of graphics processing for the AI's virtual modelling component. The OS is so thin it doesn't even have a clock.
it's a bug if you see this
